outline:
1. mesh, sackcloth, sack, sacking
    1. sack (for grain)
    2. sackcloth
      1. worn in mourning or humiliation
      2. same material spread out to lie on
strongs_def: properly, a mesh (as allowing a liquid to run through), i.e. coarse loose cloth or sacking (used in mourning and for bagging); hence, a bag (for grain, etc.)
